metadata.name: Waves 2.0: Mountains, fragment #002
metadata.description:
1920x1080 30fps video; 1min seamless loop.  
by Memo Akten, memo.tv

---

This is the second piece from a new branch in a long on-going series of works, oscillating around (if you pardon the pun) the theme of "Waves" - from ocean waves, to sound waves, to quantum field waves, to social & political waves, ... and now to waves in the crust of the Earth, slow motion waves on geological timescales, mountains.  
The work was created using a number of different AI (Artificial Intelligence) techniques.
